features: Keep everything you need for writing notes to your friends, family, business connections, and yourself with this modern boxed set of stationery appropriate for all occasions.

Set includes 10 blank cards and envelopes, 20 writing sheets and envelopes, a 75-sheet memo pad, and 30 stickers for sealing notes and letters, all in coordinating floral designs. Box is reusable for card storage and features dividers for easy organization.
Perfect for everyday lists and notes that say "thank you," "hooray," or a simple "hello," stationery essentials are also elevated enough for weddings, bridal showers, or the office.
The perfect gift for letter writers, card senders, and stationery enthusiasts.
Boutique sized cards included measure 5.2" x 3.75". Printed on high quality paper stock, Hallmark stationery is made with paper from well-managed forests.
body.description: Send a note for any occasion to family, friends, and business connections on one of the beautiful note cards or writing sheets in this boxed set, or write yourself a note or to-do list with the included note pad. Elegant card holder makes organizing your stationery easy and attractive. All the pieces of this set coordinate beautifully, making it a special gift for yourself, a coworker, or your mom or sister. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For more than 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give them a reason to smile. In good times and bad, find the perfect card to remind them you care.

Cheer them on Celebrate new jobs, promotions, graduations and other achievements with cool cards that congratulate their hard work and determination. Celebrate their love Send them your best wishes for a happy life together with sweet cards for every kind of couple. Lift them up Show your support in tough times and encourage them to keep going with cards that remind them you have their back.

Hallmark Paper Wonder Pop Up Congratulations Card for Graduation (Disco Balls) Hallmark Wedding Card (Removable Keepsake Wooden Heart Ornament) Hallmark Modern Floral Thinking of You Cards Hallmark Paper Wonder Potted Plant Pop-up Card Hallmark Just Because Cards Assortment with Card Organizer Box Purchase includes: 1 pop-up card with envelope 1 card with ornament attachment and envelope 2 cards with envelopes 1 pop-up card with envelope 10 cards with envelopes, 1 organizer box with dividers Design Blue and pink card with "OMG!" lettering and disco balls Gray with wooden heart ornament attachment Foil sketched flowers with "Thinking of You" and "Our thoughts are with you" lettering Fern plant with black and white planter and blue "You're on my mind" micro card 5 designs including leaves, bear, sun and script lettering Perfect for: Bridal showers, graduations, new jobs Weddings Sympathy, get well soon, thinking of you Encouragement, support, sympathy Congratulations, thinking of you, get well soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality I expect from Hallmark. IIke reusable boxes fo many reasons. If there were more options, I would by more. I've discovered the joy of old fashioned letter writing. My friends appreciate getting mail that isn't a bill or junk mail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift - the recipient loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are hard to come by these days. Letter writing seems to be a lost art.I am in LOVE with this set! I bought it as a reward to show myself self love. The folding up lid, envelope for stickers, the paper, note cards, quality thick pink envelopes that say Hallmark on them, all nice & neat in the box make me feel pretty, special and feminine! I am glad I chose this floral print. I love flowers too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful high quality stationery kit. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and can use for anything
reviews.reviewText: I love how this set comes with cards and notepaper. There are two sizes of paper, one set the size of the envelopes and one set twice the size (so you fold it in half to make it fit in the envelopes.) The box is also amazing because it's more sturdy than cardboard so it's easy to keep everything in the same space. A couple of pens and stamps also fit in the box with the set.The design and colors are all gorgeous. There are stickers as well. The envelopes seal nicely and have the Hallmark logo embossed on the back. I've used these for thank you cards, baptism cards, Valentines cards, and birthday cards because they are blank inside.One thing that bugs me is the paper is exactly the same size as the envelope so it doesn't fit nicely. Because of that, you have to fold the small papers to put them in without ruining them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest little stationary set ever! The box is very sturdy and so pretty with the floral graphics - definitely re-usable. The cards, notepad and stationary sheets are top-notch quality and just beautiful. The envelopes are pink and coordinate perfectly with the floral graphics. And of course the stickers are lovely too & match everything. It's expertly curated so that everything is high quality and goes together perfectly. Exactly what one would expect from Hallmark. I am extremely pleased with this set and think it would make a lovely gift. 100% recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and timeless
reviews.reviewText: This is such a pretty set from Hallmark. I ordered it in hopes of being inspired to mail physical letters, which I haven't done since I had a penpal in high school. We could all use the joy of receiving something pretty and thoughtful in the mail. This set includes letter paper, memo paper, envelopes, and stickers, all of good quality, as expected from Hallmark. Considering how much greeting cards cost these days, I think this is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty & nice quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little writing set and is the great Hallmark quality you'd expect. I really like the stickers, color-coordinated envelopes, and matching notepad. The whole set goes together really well and would make an excellent gift. Considering how much you get in this kit, I think this is a pretty decent value. Overall, very happy.
lots of different things,notes,writing paper, stickers.
